data.title: Novelty Items
data.meta_description: At Amity Manufacturing, we offer fun, novelty items that can be customized. All of our novelty items make excellent novelty gifts for your loved ones.
data.text:
Amity \'am-ăt-e\ n.: Friendship; esp: friendly relations between nations. (Webster's)

Why choose Amity Manufacturing for your novelty gift needs?

We provide novelty items that are perfect for gifts or promotional items! No one in the business has a better reputation, and if you give us the chance, we’ll show you why!

Amity Rubberized proudly manufactures and distributes products made completely in the United States. Our Patented Pick 'N' Mint dispenser is our best-selling product and a perfect replacement for a simple business card.

All of our novelty items will be a hit no matter who you give them to. We also offer unbeatable and friendly customer service.

What is Pick'N'Mint?

The original patented* Pick'N'Mint combines both toothpicks and mints in one convenient credit card-sized box. Its compact size allows it to fit in a pocket, a purse, or anywhere you would like to keep one handy.

Available in a wide array of shapes and colors and big enough for a 2"x1-1/4" imprint, Pick'N'Mints are a great way to promote your business, product, or event!

What payment types do you accept?

Our company accepts all major debit and credit cards, including but not limited to American Express, Paypal, Visa, Discover, and Mastercard. If you are unsure if your payment provider might be accepted, you can give us a call or email us. When you give our doll pattern company a call, you’ll be connected directly to our friendly staff, so you can expect immediate assistance to your inquiry. So don’t wait, call now to see how can help you!

What if my novelty item is delivered damaged?

We apologize if you have received an order of a novelty item that is damaged. If you are not satisfied with your order, please contact our customer service team at 909-821-1432 or email us at amityartwork@gmail.com

No one in the industry has a better reputation. When you give our company a call, you will be connected directly to our owner, so you can expect immediate attention to your inquiry.

How do I contact you?

In order to contact us about our novelty items, please feel free to email us via amityartwork@gmail.com, call at 909-821-1432, or send a form through the website.

Privacy Policy:

Yes, we do NOT sell your information to any third parties. Our website is 100% secure and we only ask for your contact information, such as phone number and email, so that we can contact you about your order, or if you have any questions. We do not sell this information. We do not require any other additional information such as social security numbers. At check-out, we require credit card information for payment processing. This information is also secure and you are able to use either MasterCard, American Express, PayPal, etc. We accept all major credit and debit cards. When you give our company a call, you’ll be connected directly to our friendly staff, so you can expect immediate assistance to your inquiry.
